newsitem.title: USA: Costa Rica seeks 46,000 T US long grain rice-trade.
newsitem.headline: Costa Rica seeks 46,000 T US long grain rice-trade.

text.p: Costa Rica will be seeking 46,000 tonnes of U.S. long grain paddy rice on November 13 , U.S. exporters said.
The deal includes two shipments of 23,000 tonnes each. One lot was slated for February 24-March 4 arrival and another lot was set for April 1-8.
